welcomeBack: Welcome back. Sign in to explore your family history.
createAccountMessage: Create an account to explore your family history.
signInWithNewCredentials: Please sign in with your new credentials.
emailVerificationSent: We sent a verification link to your email address. Please verify your email before signing in.
signInWithNewPassword: Please sign in with your new password.
resetPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a password reset link.
resetPasswordCheckEmail: If an account with that email exists, we have sent a password reset link. Please check your inbox.
resetPasswordUnexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
createNewPasswordDescription: Enter a new password for your account.
passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
invalidResetToken: Invalid or missing reset token. Please request a new password reset link.
expiredResetToken: Invalid or expired reset token. Please request a new password reset link.
passwordUpdated: Your password has been updated. Redirecting to login...
claimProfileDescription: Claim your existing profile to connect with your family.
allProfilesClaimed: All existing profiles have been claimed. Please contact your family administrator.
invitedToJoin: You have been invited to join the family tree as {{name}}
invalidInviteMessage: This invite link is not valid.
changePasswordRequired: You must change your password before continuing
passwordChangeRequiredMessage: For security reasons, you must change your password before you can continue using the application.
areYouInThisFamilyTree: Are you in this family tree? Claiming your profile lets you edit your information and contribute to the family history.
claimProfileLaterInSettings: You can claim your profile later in Settings
